price: Kan owwaatu warruma dhaga’u qofa. Du'aawwan immoo Rabbiin isaan kaasa. Ergasii gara Isaatti deebifamu.
arabic: ۞ إِنَّمَا يَسۡتَجِيبُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡمَعُونَۘ وَٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ يَبۡعَثُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡهِ يُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: innamā yastajību alladhīna yasmaʿūna wal-mawtā yabʿathuhumu al-lahu thumma ilayhi yur'jaʿūna
